headline: A Fresh Look at Leidos Holdings (LDOS) Valuation Following Sea Dagger's Next-Gen Defense Launch
summary: Leidos Holdings (LDOS) is making headlines after unveiling Sea Dagger, a next-generation Commando Insertion Craft designed for the Royal Navy. This project is more than just another product launch and represents a substantial leap in military technology, integrating Trusted Mission AI and autonomous systems into a single platform. For investors, the announcement is raising fresh questions about how this aligns with the company’s growth ambitions and the broader push towards defense...
